DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare quality emergency medical service cardiopulmonary resuscitation flexible stretcher standard stretcher ambulance transport hospital among out-of-hospital cardiac arrest patient .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Quality Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Between Flexible Stretcher Standard Stretcher Out-of-Hospital Cardiac Arrest
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) ambulance transport Asia know ineffective quality unsafe emergency medical service ( EMS ) provider . Small elevator high rise building serious barrier provide high quality CPR due long stretcher cart enter elevator . We develop flexible stretcher cart safely use small elevator reduce length stretcher . This study aim compare quality EMS CPR flexible stretcher standard stretcher transport hospital . Method : This after-trial metropolis EMS . Study target adult out-of-hospital cardiac arrest ( OHCA ) , exclude evident death case , pregnancy , DNR case , big small body size stretcher cart mechanical CPR device . In period , standard stretcher use manual CPR use standard CPR protocol . In period , flexible stretcher use mechanical CPR device 3 cycle standard manual CPR . Individual Utstein risk factor collect . Main outcomes no-flow fraction ( NFF ) measure defibrillator ( X-series ) safety measure mechanical error , transportation error , patient injury EMS provider injury . Sample size 24 case ( 12 case ) ( 12 case ) trial 80 % power 0.05 alpha error expect 20 % quality difference ( 30 % NFF inflexible stretcher 50 % NFF standard stretcher ) Expected impact : The study expect find benefit flexible stretcher cart CPR small elevator . This find contribute revise Asian EMS protocol improve quality CPR .
DOC.criteria: All EMSassessed OHCA ( 34 ) select district Seoul 18 year old age DoNotResuscitation case OHCA occur result terminal disease Signs evident death ( decapitation , evident livor mortis rigor mortis ) Pregnant Physique large mechanical CPR device application Chest deformation injury EMS CPR quality assess defibrillator Return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) scene departure Cardiac arrest case transport
